item.title: Introducing Tensor To Tale
item.description: Tensor To Tale is a high quality, completely customizable, performant and 100% free blog template for Jekyll.

item.title: How to configure Tensor To Tale
item.description: Learn more about the config file for Tensor To Tale and how to set it up properly.

item.title: Tensor To Tale sample post with all elements 1
item.description: Have a look at all the predesigned elements you can use in Tensor To Tale.
